review: Not as good as a roku but it will do for my kids room
author: Bethany Devazier

review: Easy to install, straight forward layout, delivered on time and even came with batteries! Very much worth the money.
author: Ken

review: Very happy with Fire Stick. Nice to have Amazon Prime and Netflix in bedroom TV which is not a smart TV. Easy to setup and use. And the price was right!
author: TravelinT

review: It worked properly but not enough movie channels. You need small variety then Fire TV stick is for you.
author: Salvador Moreno

review: I love it simple to use and can be carried to a friends house that doesn't have it so we can listen to music or watch Amazon prime. It really is worth it
author: stephanie ruelas

review: Great!  Better than I expected.  More apps than I expected!
author: Nicky Belle

review: Easy to install and set up.Works great.
author: Happy Aunt "Elag"

review: The remote control is almost impossible to open to insert batteries.  A tool had to be used.But the fire stick is really a great way to watch Netflix series and films
author: elizabeth allen

review: Very laggy sometimes... freezes while watching Netflix or Hulu and takes me multiple tries of exiting and trying again before I can get it to work again
author: Sadie Cunningham
